_attachments.5596939009b08c4882299a97d92fe97040872a86:
<h:html xmlns:h="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xmlns:orx="http://openrosa.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:jr="http://openrosa.org/javarosa" xmlns:vellum="http://commcarehq.org/xforms/vellum">
	<h:head>
		<h:title>Assess a referred patient</h:title>
		<model>
			<instance>
				<data xmlns:jrm="http://dev.commcarehq.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://openrosa.org/formdesigner/C1B5E914-079C-4D8E-AB68-4C20A8B56892" uiVersion="1" version="1" name="Assess a referred patient">
					<referrals_allow_your_field_workers_to_refer_cases_to_other_commcare_users_t/>
					<question1/>
					<please_only_complete_this_form_if_case_name_is_currently_at_the_clinic/>
					<headache_counseling_message/>
					<rupturing_counseling_message/>
					<convulsions_counseling_message/>
					<stopped_moving_counseling_message/>
					<has_condition_improved/>
					<danger_signs/>
					<please_advise_case_name_to_make_a_return_visit_to_the_clinic_in_7_days/>
					<copy-1-of-please_advise_case_name_to_make_a_return_visit_to_the_clinic_in_7_days/>
					<had_referral_checkup/>
				</data>
			</instance>
			<instance src="jr://instance/casedb" id="casedb"/>
			<instance src="jr://instance/session" id="commcaresession"/>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/referrals_allow_your_field_workers_to_refer_cases_to_other_commcare_users_t" nodeset="/data/referrals_allow_your_field_workers_to_refer_cases_to_other_commcare_users_t"/>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/question1" nodeset="/data/question1"/>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/please_only_complete_this_form_if_case_name_is_currently_at_the_clinic" nodeset="/data/please_only_complete_this_form_if_case_name_is_currently_at_the_clinic" vellum:relevant="#form/question1 = 'no'" relevant="/data/question1 = 'no'"/>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/headache_counseling_message" nodeset="/data/headache_counseling_message" vellum:relevant="selected(#case/danger_signs, 'Headache') and #form/question1 = 'yes'" relevant="selected(instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/danger_signs, 'Headache') and /data/question1 = 'yes'"/>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/rupturing_counseling_message" nodeset="/data/rupturing_counseling_message" vellum:relevant="selected(#case/danger_signs, 'Rupturing') and #form/question1 = 'yes'" relevant="selected(instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/danger_signs, 'Rupturing') and /data/question1 = 'yes'"/>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/convulsions_counseling_message" nodeset="/data/convulsions_counseling_message" vellum:relevant="selected(#case/danger_signs, 'Convulsions') and #form/question1 = 'yes'" relevant="selected(instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/danger_signs, 'Convulsions') and /data/question1 = 'yes'"/>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/stopped_moving_counseling_message" nodeset="/data/stopped_moving_counseling_message" vellum:relevant="selected(#case/danger_signs, 'Baby_stopped_moving') and #form/question1 = 'yes'" relevant="selected(instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/danger_signs, 'Baby_stopped_moving') and /data/question1 = 'yes'"/>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/has_condition_improved" nodeset="/data/has_condition_improved" vellum:relevant="#form/question1 = 'yes'" relevant="/data/question1 = 'yes'"/>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/danger_signs" nodeset="/data/danger_signs" vellum:relevant="#form/has_condition_improved = 'no' and #form/question1 = 'yes'" relevant="/data/has_condition_improved = 'no' and /data/question1 = 'yes'"/>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/please_advise_case_name_to_make_a_return_visit_to_the_clinic_in_7_days" nodeset="/data/please_advise_case_name_to_make_a_return_visit_to_the_clinic_in_7_days" vellum:relevant="#form/danger_signs != ''" relevant="/data/danger_signs != ''"/>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/copy-1-of-please_advise_case_name_to_make_a_return_visit_to_the_clinic_in_7_days" nodeset="/data/copy-1-of-please_advise_case_name_to_make_a_return_visit_to_the_clinic_in_7_days" vellum:relevant="#form/has_condition_improved = 'yes' and #form/question1 = 'yes'" relevant="/data/has_condition_improved = 'yes' and /data/question1 = 'yes'"/>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/had_referral_checkup" nodeset="/data/had_referral_checkup" vellum:calculate="if(#form/question1 = "no" or #form/danger_signs != "", 0, 1)" calculate="if(/data/question1 = "no" or /data/danger_signs != "", 0, 1)"/>
			<itext>
				<translation lang="en" default="">
					<text id="referrals_allow_your_field_workers_to_refer_cases_to_other_commcare_users_t-label">
						<value>**This *Referral Intake Form* is available because you referred <output value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/case_name" vellum:value="#case/case_name"/> in the *Mid-Pregnancy Home Visit Form*.** When field workers refer a patient, the referred case can be displayed to—and updated by—other CommCare users.</value>
						<value form="markdown">**This *Referral Intake Form* is available because you referred <output value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/case_name" vellum:value="#case/case_name"/> in the *Mid-Pregnancy Home Visit Form*.** When field workers refer a patient, the referred case can be displayed to—and updated by—other CommCare users.</value>
					</text>
					<text id="question1-label">
						<value>Is <output value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/case_name" vellum:value="#case/case_name"/> currently at the clinic?</value>
					</text>
					<text id="question1-yes-label">
						<value>Yes, the patient is at the clinic.</value>
					</text>
					<text id="question1-no-label">
						<value>No, the patient is not present.</value>
					</text>
					<text id="please_only_complete_this_form_if_case_name_is_currently_at_the_clinic-label">
						<value>This form should only be completed if <output value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/case_name" vellum:value="#case/case_name"/> is **currently at the clinic.**</value>
						<value form="markdown">This form should only be completed if <output value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/case_name" vellum:value="#case/case_name"/> is **currently at the clinic.**</value>
					</text>
					<text id="headache_counseling_message-label">
						<value><output value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/case_name" vellum:value="#case/case_name"/> previously showed signs of **headache and blurred vision.** Please provide the following counseling message:</value>
						<value form="audio">jr://file/commcare/audio/data/headache_counseling_message-1lvvdp.mp3</value>
						<value form="markdown"><output value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/case_name" vellum:value="#case/case_name"/> previously showed signs of **headache and blurred vision.** Please provide the following counseling message:</value>
					</text>
					<text id="rupturing_counseling_message-label">
						<value><output value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/case_name" vellum:value="#case/case_name"/> previously showed signs of **early water rupturing.** Please provide the following counseling message:</value>
						<value form="audio">jr://file/commcare/audio/data/rupturing_counseling_message-fbkyqp.mp3</value>
						<value form="markdown"><output value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/case_name" vellum:value="#case/case_name"/> previously showed signs of **early water rupturing.** Please provide the following counseling message:</value>
					</text>
					<text id="convulsions_counseling_message-label">
						<value><output value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/case_name" vellum:value="#case/case_name"/> previously showed signs of **convulsions.** Please provide the following counseling message:</value>
						<value form="audio">jr://file/commcare/audio/data/convulsions_counseling_message-r5egx3.mp3</value>
						<value form="markdown"><output value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/case_name" vellum:value="#case/case_name"/> previously showed signs of **convulsions.** Please provide the following counseling message:</value>
					</text>
					<text id="stopped_moving_counseling_message-label">
						<value><output value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/case_name" vellum:value="#case/case_name"/> previously showed signs of **a baby that has stopped moving.** Please provide the following counseling message:</value>
						<value form="audio">jr://file/commcare/audio/data/stopped_moving_counseling_message-5ukyct.mp3</value>
						<value form="markdown"><output value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/case_name" vellum:value="#case/case_name"/> previously showed signs of **a baby that has stopped moving.** Please provide the following counseling message:</value>
					</text>
					<text id="has_condition_improved-label">
						<value>Is <output value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/case_name" vellum:value="#case/case_name"/> healthy today?</value>
					</text>
					<text id="has_condition_improved-yes-label">
						<value>Yes</value>
					</text>
					<text id="has_condition_improved-no-label">
						<value>No</value>
					</text>
					<text id="danger_signs-label">
						<value>Is <output value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/case_name" vellum:value="#case/case_name"/> experiencing any of the following symptoms?</value>
						<value form="markdown">Is <output value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/case_name" vellum:value="#case/case_name"/> experiencing any of the following symptoms?</value>
					</text>
					<text id="danger_signs-Headache-label">
						<value>Headache or blurred vision</value>
					</text>
					<text id="danger_signs-Rupturing-label">
						<value>Early water rupturing</value>
					</text>
					<text id="danger_signs-Convulsions-label">
						<value>Convulsions</value>
					</text>
					<text id="danger_signs-Baby_stopped_moving-label">
						<value>Baby stopped moving</value>
					</text>
					<text id="please_advise_case_name_to_make_a_return_visit_to_the_clinic_in_7_days-label">
						<value>Please provide treatment and advise <output value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/case_name" vellum:value="#case/case_name"/> to return to the clinic tomorrow.</value>
					</text>
					<text id="copy-1-of-please_advise_case_name_to_make_a_return_visit_to_the_clinic_in_7_days-label">
						<value>Please advise <output value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/case_name" vellum:value="#case/case_name"/> to return to the clinic if the patient feels sick in the future.</value>
					</text>
				</translation>
			</itext>
		</model>
		<vellum:hashtags>{"#case/danger_signs":null,"#case/case_name":null}</vellum:hashtags>
		<vellum:hashtagTransforms>{"prefixes":{"#case/":"instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/"}}</vellum:hashtagTransforms>
	</h:head>
	<h:body>
		<trigger vellum:ref="#form/referrals_allow_your_field_workers_to_refer_cases_to_other_commcare_users_t" ref="/data/referrals_allow_your_field_workers_to_refer_cases_to_other_commcare_users_t" appearance="minimal">
			<label ref="jr:itext('referrals_allow_your_field_workers_to_refer_cases_to_other_commcare_users_t-label')"/>
		</trigger>
		<select1 vellum:ref="#form/question1" ref="/data/question1">
			<label ref="jr:itext('question1-label')"/>
			<item>
				<label ref="jr:itext('question1-yes-label')"/>
				<value>yes</value>
			</item>
			<item>
				<label ref="jr:itext('question1-no-label')"/>
				<value>no</value>
			</item>
		</select1>
		<trigger vellum:ref="#form/please_only_complete_this_form_if_case_name_is_currently_at_the_clinic" ref="/data/please_only_complete_this_form_if_case_name_is_currently_at_the_clinic" appearance="minimal">
			<label ref="jr:itext('please_only_complete_this_form_if_case_name_is_currently_at_the_clinic-label')"/>
		</trigger>
		<trigger vellum:ref="#form/headache_counseling_message" ref="/data/headache_counseling_message" appearance="minimal">
			<label ref="jr:itext('headache_counseling_message-label')"/>
		</trigger>
		<trigger vellum:ref="#form/rupturing_counseling_message" ref="/data/rupturing_counseling_message" appearance="minimal">
			<label ref="jr:itext('rupturing_counseling_message-label')"/>
		</trigger>
		<trigger vellum:ref="#form/convulsions_counseling_message" ref="/data/convulsions_counseling_message" appearance="minimal">
			<label ref="jr:itext('convulsions_counseling_message-label')"/>
		</trigger>
		<trigger vellum:ref="#form/stopped_moving_counseling_message" ref="/data/stopped_moving_counseling_message" appearance="minimal">
			<label ref="jr:itext('stopped_moving_counseling_message-label')"/>
		</trigger>
		<select1 vellum:ref="#form/has_condition_improved" ref="/data/has_condition_improved">
			<label ref="jr:itext('has_condition_improved-label')"/>
			<item>
				<label ref="jr:itext('has_condition_improved-yes-label')"/>
				<value>yes</value>
			</item>
			<item>
				<label ref="jr:itext('has_condition_improved-no-label')"/>
				<value>no</value>
			</item>
		</select1>
		<select vellum:ref="#form/danger_signs" ref="/data/danger_signs">
			<label ref="jr:itext('danger_signs-label')"/>
			<item>
				<label ref="jr:itext('danger_signs-Headache-label')"/>
				<value>Headache</value>
			</item>
			<item>
				<label ref="jr:itext('danger_signs-Rupturing-label')"/>
				<value>Rupturing</value>
			</item>
			<item>
				<label ref="jr:itext('danger_signs-Convulsions-label')"/>
				<value>Convulsions</value>
			</item>
			<item>
				<label ref="jr:itext('danger_signs-Baby_stopped_moving-label')"/>
				<value>Baby_stopped_moving</value>
			</item>
		</select>
		<trigger vellum:ref="#form/please_advise_case_name_to_make_a_return_visit_to_the_clinic_in_7_days" ref="/data/please_advise_case_name_to_make_a_return_visit_to_the_clinic_in_7_days" appearance="minimal">
			<label ref="jr:itext('please_advise_case_name_to_make_a_return_visit_to_the_clinic_in_7_days-label')"/>
		</trigger>
		<trigger vellum:ref="#form/copy-1-of-please_advise_case_name_to_make_a_return_visit_to_the_clinic_in_7_days" ref="/data/copy-1-of-please_advise_case_name_to_make_a_return_visit_to_the_clinic_in_7_days" appearance="minimal">
			<label ref="jr:itext('copy-1-of-please_advise_case_name_to_make_a_return_visit_to_the_clinic_in_7_days-label')"/>
		</trigger>
	</h:body>
</h:html>
_attachments.ac8eb2c2311f6b8ea705461c1ce8c1913d688ac7:
<h:html xmlns:h="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xmlns:orx="http://openrosa.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:jr="http://openrosa.org/javarosa" xmlns:vellum="http://commcarehq.org/xforms/vellum">
	<h:head>
		<h:title>Test data entry</h:title>
		<model>
			<instance>

<h:html xmlns:h="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xmlns:orx="http://openrosa.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:jr="http://openrosa.org/javarosa" xmlns:vellum="http://commcarehq.org/xforms/vellum">
	<h:head>
		<h:title>Birth Outcome</h:title>
		<model>
			<instance>
				<data xmlns:jrm="http://dev.commcarehq.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://openrosa.org/formdesigner/2A88C8EE-1716-457F-B01E-32CCD815D8AB" uiVersion="1" version="1" name="Birth Outcome">
					<closing_a_case_ensures_your_field_workers_are_focusing_only_on_your_program/>
					<pregnancy_outcome/>
					<baby_name/>
					<date_of_birth/>
					<weight_at_birth_kg/>
					<note_submitting_this_form_will_close_case_names_pregnancy_case/>
				</data>
			</instance>
			<instance src="jr://instance/casedb" id="casedb"/>
			<instance src="jr://instance/session" id="commcaresession"/>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/closing_a_case_ensures_your_field_workers_are_focusing_only_on_your_program" nodeset="/data/closing_a_case_ensures_your_field_workers_are_focusing_only_on_your_program"/>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/pregnancy_outcome" nodeset="/data/pregnancy_outcome" required="true()"/>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/baby_name" nodeset="/data/baby_name" type="xsd:string" vellum:relevant="#form/pregnancy_outcome = 'live_birth'" relevant="/data/pregnancy_outcome = 'live_birth'" required="true()"/>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/date_of_birth" nodeset="/data/date_of_birth" type="xsd:date" constraint=". <= today()" jr:constraintMsg="jr:itext('date_of_birth-constraintMsg')" vellum:relevant="#form/pregnancy_outcome = 'live_birth'" relevant="/data/pregnancy_outcome = 'live_birth'"/>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/weight_at_birth_kg" nodeset="/data/weight_at_birth_kg" type="xsd:double" constraint=". > 0" jr:constraintMsg="jr:itext('weight_at_birth_kg-constraintMsg')" vellum:relevant="#form/pregnancy_outcome = 'live_birth'" relevant="/data/pregnancy_outcome = 'live_birth'"/>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/note_submitting_this_form_will_close_case_names_pregnancy_case" nodeset="/data/note_submitting_this_form_will_close_case_names_pregnancy_case" vellum:relevant="#form/pregnancy_outcome != ''" relevant="/data/pregnancy_outcome != ''"/>
			<itext>
				<translation lang="en" default="">
					<text id="closing_a_case_ensures_your_field_workers_are_focusing_only_on_your_program-label">
						<value>**This *Birth Outcome Form* updates <output value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/case_name" vellum:value="#case/case_name"/>'s case with information on a birth, then closes <output value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/case_name" vellum:value="#case/case_name"/>'s case.** When a field worker closes a case, the data remains in CommCare's database but is removed from their mobile device.</value>
						<value form="markdown">**This *Birth Outcome Form* updates <output value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/case_name" vellum:value="#case/case_name"/>'s case with information on a birth, then closes <output value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/case_name" vellum:value="#case/case_name"/>'s case.** When a field worker closes a case, the data remains in CommCare's database but is removed from their mobile device.</value>
					</text>
					<text id="pregnancy_outcome-label">
						<value>What was the outcome of the patient's pregnancy?</value>
					</text>
					<text id="pregnancy_outcome-live_birth-label">
						<value>Live birth</value>
					</text>
					<text id="pregnancy_outcome-still_birth-label">
						<value>Still birth</value>
					</text>
					<text id="pregnancy_outcome-abortion-label">
						<value>Abortion</value>
					</text>
					<text id="baby_name-label">
						<value>What is the child's name?</value>
					</text>
					<text id="date_of_birth-label">
						<value>What is the child's date of birth?</value>
						<value form="markdown">What is the child's date of birth?</value>
					</text>
					<text id="date_of_birth-constraintMsg">
						<value>Date of birth cannot be in the future.</value>
					</text>
					<text id="weight_at_birth_kg-label">
						<value>What was the child's weight at birth (kg):</value>
						<value form="markdown">What was the child's weight at birth (kg):</value>
					</text>
					<text id="weight_at_birth_kg-constraintMsg">
						<value>Weight must be greater than 0 (value is configurable in your own application).</value>
					</text>
					<text id="note_submitting_this_form_will_close_case_names_pregnancy_case-label">
						<value>**Please note:** Submitting this form will close <output value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/case_name" vellum:value="#case/case_name"/>'s pregnancy case.</value>
						<value form="markdown">**Please note:** Submitting this form will close <output value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/case_name" vellum:value="#case/case_name"/>'s pregnancy case.</value>
					</text>
				</translation>
				<translation lang="hin">
					<text id="closing_a_case_ensures_your_field_workers_are_focusing_only_on_your_program-label">
						<value>**This *Birth Outcome Form* updates <output value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/case_name" vellum:value="#case/case_name"/>'s case with information on a birth, then closes <output value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/case_name" vellum:value="#case/case_name"/>'s case.** When a field worker closes a case, the data remains in CommCare's database but is removed from their mobile device.</value>
						<value form="markdown">**This *Birth Outcome Form* updates <output value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/case_name" vellum:value="#case/case_name"/>'s case with information on a birth, then closes <output value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/case_name" vellum:value="#case/case_name"/>'s case.** When a field worker closes a case, the data remains in CommCare's database but is removed from their mobile device.</value>
					</text>
					<text id="pregnancy_outcome-label">
						<value>What was the outcome of the patient's pregnancy?</value>
					</text>
					<text id="pregnancy_outcome-live_birth-label">
						<value>Live birth</value>
					</text>
					<text id="pregnancy_outcome-still_birth-label">
						<value>Still birth</value>
					</text>
					<text id="pregnancy_outcome-abortion-label">
						<value>Abortion</value>
					</text>
					<text id="baby_name-label">
						<value>What is the child's name?</value>
					</text>
					<text id="date_of_birth-label">
						<value>What is the child's date of birth?</value>
						<value form="markdown">What is the child's date of birth?</value>
					</text>
					<text id="date_of_birth-constraintMsg">
						<value>Date of birth cannot be in the future.</value>
					</text>
					<text id="weight_at_birth_kg-label">
						<value>What was the child's weight at birth (kg):</value>
						<value form="markdown">What was the child's weight at birth (kg):</value>
					</text>
					<text id="weight_at_birth_kg-constraintMsg">
						<value>Weight must be greater than 0 (value is configurable in your own application).</value>
					</text>
					<text id="note_submitting_this_form_will_close_case_names_pregnancy_case-label">
						<value>**Please note:** Submitting this form will close <output value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/case_name" vellum:value="#case/case_name"/>'s case.</value>
						<value form="markdown">**Please note:** Submitting this form will close <output value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/case_name" vellum:value="#case/case_name"/>'s case.</value>
					</text>
				</translation>
			</itext>
		</model>
		<vellum:hashtags>{"#case/case_name":null}</vellum:hashtags>
		<vellum:hashtagTransforms>{"prefixes":{"#case/":"instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/"}}</vellum:hashtagTransforms>
	</h:head>
	<h:body>
		<trigger vellum:ref="#form/closing_a_case_ensures_your_field_workers_are_focusing_only_on_your_program" ref="/data/closing_a_case_ensures_your_field_workers_are_focusing_only_on_your_program" appearance="minimal">
			<label ref="jr:itext('closing_a_case_ensures_your_field_workers_are_focusing_only_on_your_program-label')"/>
		</trigger>
		<select1 vellum:ref="#form/pregnancy_outcome" ref="/data/pregnancy_outcome">
			<label ref="jr:itext('pregnancy_outcome-label')"/>
			<item>
				<label ref="jr:itext('pregnancy_outcome-live_birth-label')"/>
				<value>live_birth</value>
			</item>
			<item>
				<label ref="jr:itext('pregnancy_outcome-still_birth-label')"/>
				<value>still_birth</value>
			</item>
			<item>
				<label ref="jr:itext('pregnancy_outcome-abortion-label')"/>
				<value>abortion</value>
			</item>
		</select1>
		<input vellum:ref="#form/baby_name" ref="/data/baby_name">
			<label ref="jr:itext('baby_name-label')"/>
		</input>
		<input vellum:ref="#form/date_of_birth" ref="/data/date_of_birth">
			<label ref="jr:itext('date_of_birth-label')"/>
			<alert ref="jr:itext('date_of_birth-constraintMsg')"/>
		</input>
		<input vellum:ref="#form/weight_at_birth_kg" ref="/data/weight_at_birth_kg">
			<label ref="jr:itext('weight_at_birth_kg-label')"/>
			<alert ref="jr:itext('weight_at_birth_kg-constraintMsg')"/>
		</input>
		<trigger vellum:ref="#form/note_submitting_this_form_will_close_case_names_pregnancy_case" ref="/data/note_submitting_this_form_will_close_case_names_pregnancy_case" appearance="minimal">
			<label ref="jr:itext('note_submitting_this_form_will_close_case_names_pregnancy_case-label')"/>
		</trigger>
	</h:body>
</h:html>

<h:html xmlns:h="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xmlns:orx="http://openrosa.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:jr="http://openrosa.org/javarosa" xmlns:vellum="http://commcarehq.org/xforms/vellum">
	<h:head>

			<instance>

					<follow_up_forms_enable_your_field_workers_to_update_information_in_your_cas/>
					<checkup_date/>

					<feeling_sick/>

					<had_referral_checkup/>

					<referral/>

				</data>
			</instance>
			<instance src="jr://instance/casedb" id="casedb"/>
			<instance src="jr://instance/session" id="commcaresession"/>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/follow_up_forms_enable_your_field_workers_to_update_information_in_your_cas" nodeset="/data/follow_up_forms_enable_your_field_workers_to_update_information_in_your_cas"/>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/checkup_date" nodeset="/data/checkup_date" type="xsd:date" constraint=". <= today()" jr:constraintMsg="jr:itext('checkup_date-constraintMsg')" required="true()"/>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/previously_sick" nodeset="/data/previously_sick" vellum:relevant="#form/checkup_date != '' and #case/feeling_sick = 'Yes'" relevant="/data/checkup_date != '' and instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/feeling_sick = 'Yes'"/>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/feeling_sick" nodeset="/data/feeling_sick" vellum:relevant="#form/checkup_date != ''" relevant="/data/checkup_date != ''"/>
